item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, April 23, 2025 at 6:25 PM UTC
item.description:

25. Native visionOS platform support (339 points | 240 comments)
26. Atuin Desktop: Runbooks That Run (514 points | 137 comments)
27. Pixel is a unit of length and area (104 points | 119 comments)

29. Why Does My eBPF Program Work on One Kernel but Fail on Another? (86 points | 14 comments)
